settings.icon_2_text: Package Size: 72*72*120 mm (Single Box), 220*220*125 mm (Set Box)

settings.heading: Details
settings.content:
Dive into the Transformers universe with Blokees Figures Galaxy Version 05 ONE! This collection brings the origins story to life with 9 iconic characters from the "Transformers: One" movie. Each figure features an impressive 20+ points of articulation, allowing for incredibly dynamic poses and endless play possibilities.

What makes this set truly special? First, the surprise factor - hunt for the rare metallic Optimus Prime, hidden at a 1:36 ratio! Plus, each character comes with interchangeable accessories and weapons, letting you customize your display or battle scenes.

We're constantly improving playability, with new features added in each iteration. Whether you're recreating movie moments or imagining new adventures, these highly detailed figures offer both hardcore fans and newcomers an exciting way to experience the birth of the Autobot-Decepticon conflict.

settings.heading: Shopping Tips
settings.content:
Complete Set Purchase: Each suprise figurine in the set is unique, ensuring a diverse collection without duplicates.

Single Suprise Purchase: Purchasing suprise figurines individually may result in receiving duplicate figures.

settings.heading: Shipping Terms
settings.content:
Orders in stock are usually shipped within the United State within 2-7 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to the email address attached to the order once the order has shipped. 

Please Note: International shipping is not currently available.

settings.heading: Product Care
settings.content:
Suprise Rules: 

1. For individuals aged 10 and above, please purchase suprise products under the supervision of a guardian. Kids under the age of 10 are not advised to make purchases. 

2. The packaging for these products contains small parts; do not swallow them, and do not allow kids under 3 years of age to use these toys. 

3. Suprise products are unique and random; once opened, they cannot be returned or exchanged.

settings.heading: Return
settings.content:
You can return your Blokees order within 30 days of receipt. Please make sure the collectibles you received are in unused condition with the tags and packaging intact. If you've opened the toy it can not be returned. Start your return by emailing us at service@blokees.com.. Upon receiving and inspecting your item, a refund will be processed within 10 business days according to the original method of payment.

Please Note:

  1. Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.
  2. Blokees only supports company products sold from authorized sellers in the US and the company websites.

settings.heading: Help Center
settings.content: To contact Blokees' customer service department, please email service@blokees.com or fill out the form on the contact page.

settings.heading: Packaging Contents
settings.content:
Each Single Suprise Contains:

  • Transformer Figure x 1
  • Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture (depends on the Figures)
  • Display Stand x 1
  • Instruction Manual x 1
  • Collector's Card x 1

Series Composition: 9 Transformers Blokees Figures (may have one special figure).

settings.block_text: Officially licensed by Hasbro, ensuring 100% authentic Transformers products.
Featuring 20+ articulation points for an incredible range of dynamic poses.
Limited edition figures with 9 main characters plus a rare 1/36 chance of finding the special metallic Optimus Prime.
Iconic characters redesigned for the origin story, blending classic appeal with fresh movie aesthetics.
Figures based on the upcoming Transformers: One film, representing the latest chapter in the franchise.

The probability of receiving each Transformers is marked under each action figure. For example: 1/36 means that for every 36 Transformers produced, 1 is a secret figure.

Transform your space into a miniature Cybertron today!

settings.heading: New and Enhanced Elements in Fractured Space-Time
settings.text:
Dive into the chaos of fractured space and time with the Blokees Figures. Each box is a gateway to a new dimension, holding a surprise Transformers ready to join your collection. Will you discover the resilient Ultra Magnus, the menacing Nemesis Prime, or the versatile Snarl in his dual forms? Embrace the thrill of the unknown and start assembling your ultimate team today!
This features superior articulation, a wider body for improved stability, and an array of new accessories for dynamic interplay. These upgrades ensure a more immersive and realistic experience, perfect for both collectors and fans of action-packed storytelling.

settings.heading2: Transformers ONE: The Gleaming Secret Metallic Optimus Prime
settings.subheading2: Special Edition Optimus Prime - Full Part Spraying
settings.context2: 9 iconic characters from the ONE movie, each sporting 20+ articulation points and authentic details. But here's the kicker – a rare metallic Optimus Prime might be hiding in your box! With a 1:36 chance, this dazzling variant adds extra thrill to every unboxing.
settings.context3:
The special figure in this series is produced in a ratio of 1:36.
1/36 means that for every 36 Transformers produced, there is 1 special figure.

text
Get ready to strike a pose! With 20+ points of articulation, these figures move just like the real deal. Recreate epic battle scenes and bring your Transformers to life!
Whether you’re a seasoned collector or a young builder, these sets are a fantastic gift. Attention to detail and endless possibilities will keep you entertained for hours.
text
Building together is always more fun! These sets are perfect for family time, encouraging teamwork, creating lasting memories, and sharing the joy of creativity.
text
Celebrate the 40th anniversary of Transformers with our special edition figures! These collector’s items pay tribute to the iconic legacy of this beloved franchise.
text
With 41-53 pieces in each set, the possibilities are endless! Build characters, vehicles, and entire worlds—your imagination is the only limit!

settings.title: Imagination Master
settings.context: My son spends hours building and playing with the Fractured Space-Time. His creativity and problem-solving skills have noticeably improved. These sets are a fantastic way to keep him engaged and learning!

settings.title: Tough Mom
settings.context: As a mom, I appreciate toys that can withstand rough play. These figures are incredibly durable and have survived countless battles. They’re worth every penny for their longevity alone!

settings.title: Action Fan89
settings.context: These figures bend way more than I expected. Makes posing them super fun. My desk looks awesome now!

settings.title: Safety First Dad
settings.context: I’m always concerned about the safety of the toys my kids play with. Knowing these figures are made from non-toxic materials and meeting all safety standards gives me peace of mind. Plus, my kids love them!

settings.title: Lucky Collector
settings.context: After 7 tries, I got the metallic Optimus! So worth it. The whole set looks great together.

settings.title: Movie Buff22
settings.context: Really feels like I've got the movie characters on my shelf. Wish they came with more props though.

settings.title: Toy Tinkerer
settings.context: Swapping weapons between characters is addictive. I keep finding new combos to try out.

settings.title: DetailGeek
settings.context: These aren't flimsy at all. Paint job is clean, and they feel sturdy. Good for play and display.

settings.title: Builder Dad
settings.context: The 41-53 pieces in each set offer endless building possibilities. My kids constantly come up with new characters and vehicles. It’s amazing to see their imaginations at work.

settings.title: Gift Lover
settings.context: I gave these to my nephew for his birthday, and he was over the moon! The figures are high-quality and provide hours of entertainment. It’s the perfect gift for any Transformers fan.

settings.title: Together Mom
settings.context: Building these sets together has brought my family closer. We all enjoy the creative process and the fun that follows. It’s a wonderful way to bond and create lasting memories.

settings.block_title: What makes the metallic Optimus Prime in Transformers Galaxy Version 05 ONE special?
settings.block_text: The metallic Optimus Prime is a rare and dazzling variant with a unique finish. It's ultra-rare, with only 1 in every 36 boxes containing this special figure. Are you ready to start your hunt for this legendary Prime?

settings.block_title: Are Transformers Galaxy Version 05 ONE figures durable enough for active play?
settings.block_text: Absolutely! These figures are made with high-quality, durable materials designed to withstand both play and display. They're built to last, perfect for recreating epic battles or posing on your shelf.

settings.block_title: Can Transformers Galaxy Version 05 ONE figures transform?
settings.block_text: No, these figures don't transform into vehicles. Instead, they offer incredible posability with 20+ articulation points, allowing for dynamic action poses and creative play scenarios.

settings.block_title: What materials are used for Transformers Galaxy Version 05 ONE figures, and are they safe?
settings.block_text: Our figures are crafted from high-quality, durable materials that meet strict safety standards. They're safe for play and display, making them perfect for both kids and collectors.

settings.block_title: What is the recommended age range for Transformers Galaxy Version 05 ONE?
settings.block_text: These figures are ideal for fans aged 10 and up. They offer a great balance of playability and collectibility that appeals to a wide range of ages.

settings.block_title: How many figures are in the Transformers Galaxy Version 05 ONE collection?
settings.block_text: There are 9 unique Cybertronian characters in the full collection, each with their own abilities and backstories from the Transformers: One movie.

settings.block_title: What accessories come with Transformers Galaxy Version 05 ONE figures?
settings.block_text: Each figure comes with interchangeable weapons, hands, and accessories. There are 40-48 pieces in total, allowing for extensive customization and play options.

settings.block_title: Why choose Transformers Galaxy Version 05 ONE?
settings.block_text: With movie-accurate designs, high articulation, customizable features, and the thrill of potentially unboxing a rare metallic Optimus Prime, Transformers Galaxy Version 05 ONE offers an exciting collecting and play experience for Transformers fans!

settings.heading: Detailed Manual
settings.context: We've included an easy-to-follow manual with your Blokees set. Find it in the product details section for all the tips and tricks you'll need.
